title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4112.1 - Overnight events
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4112.1 - Overnight events

State Regulations

No more than eight horses shall be allowed to start in
overnight events except in invitation races unless otherwise authorized by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4112.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
